stories.headline: Big Penix Energy
stories.bodyText:
Michael Penix took over as the Falcons‚Äô starting quarterback late in the 2024 season after the team benched Kirk Cousins, who had struggled with turnovers and poor performance.

at UW he literally turned his name into a meme-y NIL brand ‚ÄúBig Penix Energy‚Äù in an official collab with Seattle retailer Simply Seattle

stories.headline: Texas #1; bad sign?
stories.bodyText:
Florida State was a four-point favorite in its Week 1 game against No. 8 Miami in 1988 and lost outright ‚Äî a reminder that early upsets can derail a title run.

In that 1988 upset, Miami‚Äôs defense held Florida State to just 10 points, sparking Miami‚Äôs rise to a national championship that season.

stories.headline: Tswizzle + Kelce meet cute
stories.bodyText:
During Taylor Swift‚Äôs Kansas City 'Eras Tour' stop in 2023, Travis Kelce tried to give her a friendship bracelet with his number, sparking fan speculation and media buzz.

That failed bracelet handoff became the opening chapter of one of sports and music‚Äôs biggest crossover relationships.

stories.headline: What if...?
stories.bodyText:
In 2007, Mark Cuban said Lakers GM Mitch Kupchak ‚Äústepped up‚Äù and convinced Kobe to stay in L.A. after the Lakers and Mavericks had a trade framework in place.

If the trade happened, a Kobe‚ÄìDirk duo might have been one of the most unstoppable pairings in NBA history.

stories.headline: Fighting in DC, not the political kind
stories.bodyText:
UFC head honcho Dana White confirmed plans to stage a Fight Night at the White House South Lawn on July 4 to celebrate the 250th birthday of the United States.

Nothing screams 'America at 250' like cage fighting on government property.

stories.headline: Not exactly Taco Tuesday
stories.bodyText:
Wisconsin chain George Webb gives out free burgers whenever the Brewers win 12 straight games, a promise dating back to 1970.

The Brewers have now triggered the free burger giveaway three times: 1987, 2018, and 2025.
